{{beyondbree: '''''Beyond Bree'' May 1985''' is an issue of ''[[Beyond Bree]]'', edited by [[Nancy Martsch]].

The issue reproduces a genealogical tree by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] entitled '[[Kinship of the Half-elven]]' and an extract from a manuscript [[Concerning ... 'The Hoard']] together with several extracts from letters to Eileen Elgar regarding ''[[The Silmarillion]]'' ([[Letter to Eileen Elgar (5 March 1964)
column2: a letter of 5 March 1964]] and [[Letter to Eileen Elgar (24 December 1971)

{{beyondbree: Further discussion and explanation of the genealogical tree were published in the [[Beyond Bree June 1985
